content:
I am a lecturer/researcher in the Department of English at East China Normal University. My research interest broadly lies in philosophy of language, experimental philosophy, and psycholinguistics. I am currently working on the referential mechanism of proper names and the role of intuition in the philosophical studies of language.
When I am not teaching, reading or writing, I am cooking. (Recipes to be updated later ðŸ˜ƒ
